    • setTowerColor

      public void setTowerColor(TowerColor towerColor)
      Sets a new TowerColor and adds a tower if the island has none. Does NOT check if the island can be merged with adjacent islands
      Parameters:
      towerColor - the TowerColor which will own the Island

    • mergeWith

      public void mergeWith(Island other)
      Gets every Student, tower and noEntry tile from another Island
      Parameters:
      other - the Island which the method gets everything from

    • getIndexIn

      public int getIndexIn(List<Island> islands)
      Returns the index of this island in the given list of islands, or -1 if the island is not in the given list. Unlike List.indexOf(), this method uses pointer comparison (==) and not equals()
      Parameters:
      islands - a list of islands
      Returns:
      the index of this island in the given list

    • giveStudent

      public void giveStudent(Place destination, Student student) throws InvalidStudentException, InvalidActionException
      Description copied from interface: Place
      Transfers a student to the destination. The student will no longer be present in the object which this method is called on.
      Specified by:
      giveStudent in interface Place
      Parameters:
      destination - Place which the method gives the student to
      student - The student given to the destination
      Throws:
      InvalidStudentException
      InvalidActionException
